dcterms:creator: E. Troiano
C. Strapparava
G. Özbal
S. S. Tekiroğlu
dcterms:description: The HYPO dataset contains 709 hyperbolic sentences each with a corresponding paraphrased literal sentence resulting in 1,418 sentences. It was used to test the hypothesis that metaphors help in hyperbole detection.
dcterms:title: HYPO

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhang
X. Wan
dcterms:description: The HYPO-L dataset includes 1,007 hyperbolic sentences and 2,219 paraphrased sentences. It was annotated with metaphor labels to explore the relationship between hyperbole and metaphor.
dcterms:title: HYPO-L

dcterms:creator: J. Birke
A. Sarkar
dcterms:description: The TroFi dataset consists of verbs in their literal and metaphoric form, and was used to annotate metaphor labels with hyperbole labels in this study.
dcterms:title: TroFi

dcterms:creator: M. Mohler
M. Brunson
B. Rink
M. Tomlinson
dcterms:description: The LCC dataset contains sentence-level annotations for metaphors in four languages totaling 188,741 instances, and was annotated with hyperbole labels in this study.
dcterms:title: LCC
